title: Enhancing Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Online Workshop for Strengthening Core Competencies in Special Education Curricula

context.prior_knowledge: Basic special education concepts and science subject teaching experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design integrated thinking-based lessons with over 80% accuracy according to a competency-based instructional design framework
Develop three or more interactive learning activities by applying digital textbook strategies to science subjects
Analyze the lesson implementation process five or more times through self-directed reflective journals and derive improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
